Text: Thanks for this issue.  I'm having one hell of a time downloading issues 7 through 20.  The torrents all seem to be dead (probably because they're old, and I'm late to this party).  Gonna keep trying though because this series (from what I've read of it) is great!
Any chance you could upload Hoax Hunters #7?

jeffro187, you're welcome.

am1188, our friend reneshakil just did. here's a link: http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8144279/Hoax_Hunters_007_2013.cbr

bloominoctober, are you downloading the individual issue torrents? if so try http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/7430022/Morning_Glories_On-going_by_Image_Comics%2801-20%29
'cause it has like 20 seeders. lemme know later if you don't get them d/l.
Thank you for the heads up and double thanks for all the work you put in!
you're very welcome, am1188. just always want to share some good comics!
